## General Science Communication Resources
* [AAAS Communication Toolkit](https://www.aaas.org/resources/communication-toolkit)

## Science Communcation Training
* [Science Says](https://davissciencesays.ucdavis.edu/) at UC Davis
* [#SciFund Challenge Classes](https://scifundchallenge.org/scifund-classes/)
* [Science Talk Courses](https://www.sciencetalk.org/training--courses.html)
  + Cost ~$100 to participate in a **Science Talk** course

## Writing Training / Opportunities
* [The Ethogram at UC Davis](https://theethogram.com/author/theethogram/)
* [Massive Science](https://massivesci.com/)
* [oceanbites](https://oceanbites.org/)

## Scientific Filmmaking
* [Jackson Wild Media Lab](https://www.jacksonwild.org/2020-media-lab.html)
* Eric Sanford has also periodically offers a scientific filmmaking course at UC Davis
### Science Policy
* [MIT Communication Lab Intro to Policy Communication](https://mitcommlab.mit.edu/be/commkit/public-policy-communication-introduction/)
* [National Science Policy Network SciPol Resource Guide](https://scipolnetwork.org/page/scipol-guide)
